input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch
input_text.Response A: Happy 65th birthday! This travel mug is a great way to take your favorite hot or cold drink along. With a tapered bottom this stylish, this 14oz mug fits in a standard cup holder and features an easy-grip handle with thumb rest, slide opening lid, and slanted drinking surface. This travel mug is made of stainless steel. Not microwave safe, hand washing is recommended.
input_text.Response B: ECU East Carolina men's two tone gold dress watch. College s executive timepiece offers men a classic, business-appropriate look. Features a 23kt gold-plated bezel, stainless steel case and date function. Secures to your wrist with a two-tone solid stainless steel band complete with safety clasp. Look good, while supporting your favorite team. Perfect for work, the game, a party, or any formal event. Water resistant up to 3 ATM.

label_annotations.factors_a: totally wrong product, it wasn't a mug
